column6: It's the Avengers versus some of their all-time greatest foes! Powerful Asgardian artifacts are on Earth...but can the Avengers recover them before Loki? Contains four short stories featuring the villainous Red Skull, Attuma, Loki, MODOK, and more!
column8: | artist:Wellington Alves | artist:Dario Brizuela | artist:Andrea Divito | artist:Ron Lim | writer:Joe Caramagna | penciller (cover):Tom Raney
